verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Love is the flag flown from the castle of my heart From the castle of my heart From the castle of my heart Love is the flag flown from the castle of my heart Where the King is in residence there.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So fly it high in the sky Let the whole world know Let the whole world know Let the whole world know So fly it high in the sky Let the whole world know That the King is in residence there.{/lang-eng}
